title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: A 4C/ID Model for Enhancing Clinical Reasoning Skills in Dental Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze actual dental treatment scenarios with over 80% accuracy to establish appropriate diagnostic and treatment plans
Learners can apply cognitive load management strategies when solving complex clinical problems through the 4C/ID model's iterative practice procedures
Learners develop the ability to reflect on their clinical reasoning processes and correct errors based on peer and instructor feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
